sense.def: Alternative Names ru shi du 乳石毒 , stalactite mineral poison; shi du 石毒 , mineral poison; wu shi du 五石毒 , the five mineral poisons. Etiological Agent. Combined Designation of the poison of medication based on finest stalactite powder ingested to strengthen the body. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 24: 石藥毒：用白鴨屎、人參汁 , “For mineral drug poison : use the feces of white ducks and ren shen juice”.
